title: The Majority Leader Has Lost. Long Live The Majority Leader
teaser: Shortly after Rep. Eric Cantor's surprise defeat in the Republican primary, Cantor announced his plans to step down soon from his position as House majority leader. This will leave a void in the GOP leadership, an open spot that's sure to attract plenty of interest.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
